attributes.action: Pay for agency and supply teachers who are paid through PAYE
attributes.additional_details: There are thousands of agency and supply workers are struggling financially due to school closures. If self employed are getting support, zero hour workers should too.
attributes.background: Even though supply teachers pay national insurance and tax, they are not being financially considered in the current crisis. They are paid through PAYE and should therefore be eligible for pay!

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302505

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
